price: Seenaan keessummaa Ibraahiim kabajamoo ta’anii sitti dhufeeraa?
arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيۡفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: hal atāka ḥadīthu ḍayfi ib'rāhīma al-muk'ramīna
